p: Another parasite that has attracted the attention of scientists is Haemonchus contortus. It is a nematode whose hosts are ruminants. Most often, it infests sheep and goats, in which it causes anaemia, which adversely affects the health of these farm animals [ 104]. In the search for new substances capable of controlling infestations with this parasite, research has been carried out in many centres around the world using extracts from A. absinthium.
